func.title: GetPXSCount

param.name: material
param.desc: Index of material. If nil or -1, any material is counted.

param.name: x
param.desc: Left side of search rectangle. Offset in local calls. Set to nil to search the whole map.

param.name: y
param.desc: Top side of search rectangle. Offset in local calls.

param.name: wdt
param.desc: Width of search rectangle. Right border is not included in search.

param.name: wdt
param.desc: Height of search rectangle. Bottom border is not included in search.

func.desc: Determines how many loose pixels (PXS) are present of a given material in a given rectangle.

example.text: Part of a clonk script: if snow is found around the clonk, he shows a message above his head.
